response.overview: Taking a break from their dreary lives, close friends Thelma and Louise embark on a short weekend trip that ends in unforeseen incriminating circumstances. As fugitives, both women rediscover the strength of their bond and their newfound resilience.
response.tagline: Somebody said get a life...so they did.
response.title: Thelma & Louise
